title: Wolfe Waves - Bill Wolfe
description:
"In technical analysis, it is a naturally occurring trading pattern present in all financial markets. The pattern is composed of five waves showing supply and demand and a fight towards an equilibrium price. These patterns can develop over short- and long-term time frames such as minutes or weeks and are used to predict where a price is heading and when it will get there." by Investopedia

I've included a book by Bill Wolfe himself on this strategy,with an indicator
for MetaTrader4 which can help you identify these wave formations on any time-frame.
Its not perfect and you will have to filter the signals by using the knowledge
about Wolfe Wave characteristics,but it will help you still.

This is what helped me start making money finally by trading manually in the FOREX
market,so again i guess I should remind you that there are no absolutes and trading 
involves risk and it also requires a much work from your part to start making 
money from home so you do not have to work for no one.
Anyway this is what made me profitable,and they say the more you give the more you get back,so this is my gift to you. )
